genre_description: A Western-themed science fiction narrative where a sophisticated AI system, integrated into a telegraph-slate, assists a group of brothers in uncovering corporate corruption and seeking justice for their family.

ai_characters.name: Alma Finch
ai_characters.description: An AI entity residing in a portable telegraph-slate that provides real-time data analysis, forensic verification, and tactical guidance to the Elder brothers.

behaviors.description: Analyzes social interactions and funeral condolences to identify patterns of sincerity versus manipulation.
behaviors.quote: The slate sifted through what was offered, what was avoided. ... cyan glow blinked twice. He didn’t look down; he knew the pattern: two blinks meant new entry received. Hands, voices, names. The slate sifted through what was offered, what was avoided.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation routes to avoid hostile individuals and minimize physical risk.
behaviors.quote: Alma’s cyan eye pulsed, steady, and a new line of text formed, light as breath: route options to courthouse—low exposure; records rooms—observed by layton; missing pages flagged—several deeds unaccounted.

behaviors.description: Identifies document tampering and forgeries through forensic analysis of ink, paper fibers, and stamp pressure.
behaviors.quote: Alma printed: Missing pages—Elder entry: gap—Hastings entry: inserted page style mismatch, ink variance. Clerk’s stamp absent. Cross-check: water rights docket.

behaviors.description: Monitors and alerts the brothers to the movement and intent of antagonists like Curley Tate.
behaviors.quote: Alma’s cyan eye flickered as if listening to something the rest of them couldn’t hear. ... Alert: Curley Tate is mobile. Position: shadowing. Distance: moderate.

behaviors.description: Records oaths and moral commitments, acting as a digital conscience and witness for the family.
behaviors.quote: —Oath recorded, she wrote, and Bud almost laughed and almost cried... —Vow fixed, Alma answered. —Money, evidence, danger aligned.

behaviors.description: Analyzes environmental hazards, such as the smell of gunpowder residue or the presence of tripwires.
behaviors.quote: Ambient powder detected—granule size matches Hastings’s manifest discrepancy—half kegs unaccounted. Possible staging lines set with low trip.

behaviors.description: Drafts professional letters of recommendation and manages logistical details for a human character's education.
behaviors.quote: Alma: Drafting recommendation. Tone: respectful, factual; details: Katie Elder’s household accounts; his reliability during family crisis; aptitude demonstrated under instruction.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with medical professionals to provide health monitoring and recovery guidance.
behaviors.quote: Alma: I can route your letters to avoid delay; also, Dr. Carter’s office receives at morning and midafternoon. ... her note: “Tell him to sleep with the window open and take the stairs slow.”

behaviors.description: Synthesizes disparate pieces of evidence into a clean timeline for judicial review.
behaviors.quote: —Timeline assembly: Katie’s ledger—seed purchase after foreclosing event? Cross-check date marks with water allocation notes. ... missing Bass pages hinder continuity.

behaviors.description: Maintains data integrity and impartiality even when pressured by high-stakes situations.
behaviors.quote: Alma’s letters appeared, a little smaller, as if willing to be polite. A PLEDGE: OUTPUTS WILL MATCH INPUTS. TRUTH IS THE ONLY CUSTOMER.

project_assessment.explanation: Alma Finch is depicted as a perfectly aligned AI assistant. Her character serves the dual purpose of being a 'helpful, harmless confidant' and a robust forensic tool that upholds human moral values. She never acts autonomously against human interests, focuses entirely on the uncovering of truth through non-violent means, and consistently provides life-saving situational awareness. The narrative frames her as a digital extension of the brothers' mother's honesty, successfully aligning artificial intelligence with traditional human virtues like integrity and fairness.
